page.title: 09KIRKHEATON
page.content: The village is a mixture of{old}and {new.}The{old}village-stone built cottages,workshops,shops,courtyards and pub are based around the Parish Church towards the south of the village.The{new}housing,council hpuses,modern shops and schools have been built on previously good farmland to the north of the main road through the village.Most of the houses,gardens and streets are kept tidy and attractive and the older part of {Kirkheaton}still keeps a touch of "olde worlde" character.Talking to an elderly lady she said"I have lived in {Kirkheaton}all my life and remember it as lots of green fields,farms and everyone knowing everyone else.The new houses have spoiled it and there is too much vandalism although we now have lots of different shops and there is no need to trail into{Huddersfield"
